a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Monthly COâ‚‚ emissions from all commercial passenger flights
Includes emissions from both domestic and international aviation. Domestic aviation represents flights which
depart and arrive within the same country. International aviation emissions are assigned to the country of

g.text: Monthly COâ‚‚ emissions from international aviation Monthly COâ‚‚ emissions from international aviation
Monthly COâ‚‚ emissions from domestic aviation Monthly COâ‚‚ emissions from domestic aviation
Monthly COâ‚‚ total emissions from aviation Monthly COâ‚‚ total emissions from aviation

text.tspan: Note: Data on aviation emissions is missing for some countries, so actual global and regional emissions are higher. Regional emissions are
shown to highlight trends over time and should not be compared.
